title: Understanding Paraprofessionals
text: Paraprofessionals play a crucial role in supporting students with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). They work closely with these students to help them in various activities.

title: Role of Paraprofessionals
text: Paraprofessionals provide valuable insights into the student's strengths, areas of need, interests, and other issues. They are an integral part of the educational team.

hintAnswer: they work with students with ASD on a variety of activities, providing valuable insight into the student's strengths, areas of needs, interests, and other issues
title: Identifying the Correct Role
text: Which of the following best describes the role of paraprofessionals?
choices: they implement a process of systemically applying interventions to modify an individual's behavior and at the same time collecting data to evaluate the effect of each intervention on the individual's behavior
they work with students with ASD on a variety of activities, providing valuable insight into the student's strengths, areas of needs, interests, and other issues
they develop and monitor appropriate feeding plans to address the nutritional needs of the child, as well as other feeding issues such as food preferences, food habits, and sensory issues
